text: Grace Ethel Cecile Rosalie Allen (July 26, 1895Grace Allen, age 4 years, born July 1895. U.S. Census, June 1, 1908, State of California, County of San Francisco, enumeration district 38, p. 11A, family 217. â€“ August 27, 1964) was an American actress and comedian. She was in many movies. Her career in the entertainment industry lasted until 1958. She was the wife of actor George Burns ==References== category:American movie actors Category:Comedians from San Francisco Category:Actors from San Francisco category:1964 deaths Category:1895 births
title: Gracie Allen
